title: Logging Into This Website Changes My Boards Layout
body:
Hello, I was just trying to figure out why when I log into boards here the layout of the comments changes.

When I'm not logged in, all replies are placed directly under the comment they pertain to, but when I log in, 
it changes so that the reply to one comment says who they are replying to, except it could be far down the page.

This makes  it harder to see individual trains of thought and get answers to questions i have, and makes the 
comment thread feel oddly disjointed.

I would really appreciate it if somebody knows how to fix it and put it back.

Thank you for reading about my issue.
